contentList.content:
The number of times you can use your Tides of Chaos.

The number of charges increases as the sorcerer class level increases. (Sorcerer level 1: 1, level 2: 2, level 5: 3, level 9: 4, level 13: 5, level 17: 6)

The increased number of charges will be refreshed upon reloading the game.
